text: CCP has decided to extended capsuleer day this year, to blend it into its current high sec PvE Drifter Crisis event.  The company has, in recent years, cut most of its old holidays down to the bone, with only three appearing on the 2025 roadmap, the rest having become mere vehicles for cash shop sales.  The Gallente Federation Day sale is coming soon! The EVE Online 2025 Roadmap And Capsuleer Day has been, in the past, little more than such a sales event, revisited every May to celebrate the launch of the game back in 2003, with a few give aways for players. In order to turn it into something at least comparable in scale to the other two annual holidays, the Crimson Harvest and the Winter Nexus, the ongoing high sec Drifter Crisis event is being drafted to add some semblance of activity to the whole thing.  The event is being billed as follows: Capsuleer Day XXII is live – the final phase of the Drifter Crisis has begun Activities for all playstyles in all areas of New Eden New Drifter wormhole combat sites: Labyrinth Complex – randomized multi-room PvE gauntlet Nexus Point – high-end site unlocked with a key from the Labyrinth Complex K-space exploration content with chances at Genolution implants, SKINs, and more Expect the unexpected on 6 May You will be able to mine a special ore… The Agency will guide you to systems with the new Tyranite ore, though it seems to take a while to update when a system has been mined out… that will let you manufacture filaments that will take you to special event wormholes.  The “all playstyles” no doubt indicates that you can expect to find bots, gankers, and multi-boxers in the event sites.  Maybe, this time, they’ll fight each other and leave you alone. But at least we will have login rewards.  It isn’t even a cash shop holiday event without some sort of login rewards going on. Capsuleer Day 2025 Login Rewards This year there are 30 days of login rewards, though there is no end date for the event listed, so assume you can’t miss a day I suppose.  That said, the last day for decent rewards, like SKINs and skill points, is day 22 and everything after that is more boosters and SKINR elements. For Omega accounts that get to day 22, you will reap 650K skill points.  Not bad.  For Alpha accounts, you still end up with 130K skill points over the course of the event.  That should be enough to inflate logins so CCP can declare victory internally. Am I feeling a bit cynical this year?  How could you tell?  CCP still feels more interested in its blockchain EVE knock-off game, EVE Frontier, though the first person shooter, EVE Vanguard, seems to have gone quiet for a while.  Is the crypto scam stealing resources from that too now in order to hit funding milestones?  I suspect we’ll hear more about that at Fanfest… about the games, not the VC puppet masters. Fanfest starts at the end of the month, so whatever updates they have will be arriving in about two weeks. html:
CCP has decided to extended capsuleer day this year, to blend it into its current high sec PvE Drifter Crisis event.  The company has, in recent years, cut most of its old holidays down to the bone, with only three appearing on the 2025 roadmap, the rest having become mere vehicles for cash shop sales.  The Gallente Federation Day sale is coming soon!

The EVE Online 2025 Roadmap

And Capsuleer Day has been, in the past, little more than such a sales event, revisited every May to celebrate the launch of the game back in 2003, with a few give aways for players.

In order to turn it into something at least comparable in scale to the other two annual holidays, the Crimson Harvest and the Winter Nexus, the ongoing high sec Drifter Crisis event is being drafted to add some semblance of activity to the whole thing.  The event is being billed as follows:

  • Capsuleer Day XXII is live – the final phase of the Drifter Crisis has begun
  • Activities for all playstyles in all areas of New Eden
  • New Drifter wormhole combat sites:
    • Labyrinth Complex – randomized multi-room PvE gauntlet
    • Nexus Point – high-end site unlocked with a key from the Labyrinth Complex
  • K-space exploration content with chances at Genolution implants, SKINs, and more
  • Expect the unexpected on 6 May

You will be able to mine a special ore… The Agency will guide you to systems with the new Tyranite ore, though it seems to take a while to update when a system has been mined out… that will let you manufacture filaments that will take you to special event wormholes.  The “all playstyles” no doubt indicates that you can expect to find bots, gankers, and multi-boxers in the event sites.  Maybe, this time, they’ll fight each other and leave you alone.

But at least we will have login rewards.  It isn’t even a cash shop holiday event without some sort of login rewards going on.

Capsuleer Day 2025 Login Rewards

This year there are 30 days of login rewards, though there is no end date for the event listed, so assume you can’t miss a day I suppose.  That said, the last day for decent rewards, like SKINs and skill points, is day 22 and everything after that is more boosters and SKINR elements.

For Omega accounts that get to day 22, you will reap 650K skill points.  Not bad.  For Alpha accounts, you still end up with 130K skill points over the course of the event.  That should be enough to inflate logins so CCP can declare victory internally.

Am I feeling a bit cynical this year?  How could you tell?  CCP still feels more interested in its blockchain EVE knock-off game, EVE Frontier, though the first person shooter, EVE Vanguard, seems to have gone quiet for a while.  Is the crypto scam stealing resources from that too now in order to hit funding milestones?  I suspect we’ll hear more about that at Fanfest… about the games, not the VC puppet masters.

Fanfest starts at the end of the month, so whatever updates they have will be arriving in about two weeks.
